title: Constant disconnecting in-game makes it unplayable
body: I don't have this issue in any other games I play, I've set all my downloads on my PC to stop, closed completely out of everything else but League, set all wireless devices to LTE to avoid Wifi slowing down if that was the problem, none of it helped at all. In game I get disconnected at least once a minute for 3 seconds to as much as 30 seconds. The game isn't registering what I do at all, but it does register what everyone else does. I walk up to kill some creeps, stop in place where I last clicked, can't move anywhere or cast anything. Enemy comes up to me and basic attacks me to death and I can't do shit. I don't know if this is some kind of firewall thing or something that prevents me from sending data to the server or what, but as of now, the game is completely unplayable. This has only been happening since I got the new client. Please help if anyone can.

replies.body: You could be having issues specifically connecting to the game server and it could be a local or ISP issue.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your PC and get a better overview.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewalls.  Hopefully, this will get your connection back to normal!
I tried the hextech repair tool and everything seems fine.  No packet loss and a 43 ms ping.
I am having a very similar problem. I keep getting the attempting to reconnect. I can not play any game modes.
